instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-0045 A1534
threads.message:
hi,
i have 820-0045 motherboard

device turns on and seems apple logo while loading system shutdown or restart
Device turns on, apple logo shows up but during loading screen it shuts down


I tried to install via usb, it turned off again


no liquid

threads.title: 820-0045 A1534
threads.message:
Test the board alone on the desk; without any peripheral connected.
Just check for USB activity, or external video.
See if still turns off.

threads.title: 820-0045 A1534
threads.message:
solved
I changed the CPU thermal paste.

threads.title: 820-0045 A1534
threads.message:
hi,
problem repeated
Is the cpu faulty?

threads.title: 820-0045 A1534
threads.message: It always ends failing on these boards...
